original_title: I didn't go to Crimea and all I got was this alien message
overview: In 2017, in the Belorussian village of Dobrovola, I found a photo album created by Boris. In the years 1984-86 he was in served in the military in Crimea. Drawings in the album indicate the author's interest in the cosmos, specifically the radar complex near Eupatoria. By transforming the album into a virtual space of observation of various paths of memory, the temporal and spatial scale has been disturbed and private memories are on an equal footing with interplanetary ones.
title: I didn't go to Crimea and all I got was this alien message
